biography_text: UNDERWOOD, Lauren, a Representative from Illinois; born in Naperville, DuPage County, Ill., October 4, 1986; graduated Neuqua Valley High School, Naperville, Ill., 2004; B.S.N., University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, Mich., 2008; M.S.N., Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Md., 2009; M.P.H., Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Md., 2009; nurse; professor; senior advisor, United States Department of Health and Human Services, 2014-2017; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, Mich.
